dct_title_s: Map of Central & Southern China, illustrating Mr. McCarthy's journey from Chin-Kiang to Bhamo 1877
dct_description_sm: Boundaries of Chinese provinces, Tibet, Burma, Assam, and Tonkin are shown. Author's route shown in red. Linear scales in geographical miles, Chinese li, and English statute miles are shown. Relief shown by hachures. From: Proceedings of the Royal Geographical Society and monthly record of geography. Vol. 1 (1879), no. 8, pp. 489-509; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J6873
